channel.title: Comments on: Меньше пытаться, больше делать
channel.description: Технический перевод и локализация. IT Translation

item.title: By: Mykhailo
item.dc:creator: Mykhailo
item.description: Do or do not. There is no try. —Yoda
item.content:encoded:
Do or do not. There is no try.
—Yoda

item.title: By: Maxim
item.dc:creator: Maxim
item.description: Михаил, на эту тему есть хорошая <a href="http://en.wikiquote.org/wiki/Samuel_Beckett" rel="nofollow">цитата из Беккета</a>:<BR> Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
item.content:encoded:
Михаил, на эту тему есть хорошая цитата из Беккета:
Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.

item.title: By: Mykhailo
item.dc:creator: Mykhailo
item.description:
Просто афоризм в тему: :)
Kids, you tried your best, and you failed miserably. The lesson is, never try. Homer Simpson
item.content:encoded:
Просто афоризм в тему: :)

Kids, you tried your best, and you failed miserably. The lesson is, never try.
Homer Simpson
